Table: Updated Improved Familiar List
FamiliarAlignmentArcane Spellcaster Level
Arbiter inevitableLawful neutral7th
BrownieNeutral7th
Cacodaemon daemonNeutral evil7th

Dire ratNeutral3rd

Homunculus2Any7th
ImpLawful evil7th

Mephit (any type)Neutral7th

Paracletus aeonNeutral7th

1Or other celestial, entropic, fiendish, or resolute animal from the standard familiar list.2The master must first create the homunculus.
